about_the_game:
The investigation deepens with the "Unsolved Case: Ash and Secrets" DLC, offering players an extended experience packed with four additional locations, new puzzles, and vital evidence that will transform your understanding of the case. This expansion is more than just extra content—it's a thrilling extension to the core mystery, filled with hidden objects and clues that give players the opportunity to learn more about the shadowy criminal world and the people who inhabit it. These new locations reveal secrets that will challenge your skills as a detective like never before!

The DLC not only adds new crime scenes and storylines but also introduces fresh puzzles and interactive elements, from lockpicking hospital archives to examining evidence in new ways. These locations offer richer character development, allowing players to uncover hidden motivations and secrets that were previously inaccessible.

♟️ INVESTIGATE THE TRUCKER’S MURDER!

Examine the truck and personal belongings in a new crime scene that sheds light on trucker final moments. Discover new clues that reveal why he was camped in the woods, what drove him there, and how his murder fits into the larger web of corruption and deceit.

♟️ UNCOVER VIVIAN’S MYSTERY ILLNESS!

Sneak into a hospital’s archives, where you’ll find hidden puzzles that unlock vital information about the illness. Restore a corrupted database and retrieve Vivian’s medical files, which could hold the key to saving her life or revealing a new dimension to the case.

♟️ EXAMINE A SUSPICIOUS FIRE!

A burned-down shack hides more than charred remains. Investigate the site thoroughly to determine whether this fire was an unfortunate accident or a deliberate act of arson. Scour the wreckage for subtle clues, analyze items left behind, and decide if this crime is linked to the greater conspiracy you’re unraveling.

♟️ DISCOVER ALFIE’S SECRETS AT THE BAR!

Alfie’s suspicious behavior has already led to one detective’s suspension, but his secrets run deeper. Search through a gritty bar where Alfie was last seen, eavesdrop on conversations, and explore his connections with dangerous individuals!

As you explore "Unsolved Case: Ash and Secrets" DLC, piece together the broader picture of a world where every action has consequences, and no one is truly innocent.
